title: Factorial Explained
course: Discrete Mathematics by Prof Sudarshan Iyengar

transcript.text: Our aim now would be to understand the  notion of factorial of a number. Let
us see what are factorials all about. Let us revisit how we started off with
the chapter. In how many ways can this  one person take her photographs? In how
many ways can two people take it? In how  many ways can three people take it. In how
many ways can four and five people take  it. As you're observing all we are doing
here is n factorial. Let us now see how  exactly it turns out to be n factorial.
